Игра просто кайф. Много режимов, много скинов, крутые оружия и тд. Мне лично не понравилось то, что в игре прайм статус стал платным, да еще ценник огромный. Буду ждать пока прайм станут давать бесплатно за прохождение уровней, но игру сделать платной, чтобы было меньше читеров.
没有比这个更好的游戏了

This game is shit but i recomend

These days more and more multiplayer games launch without voice chat features, and even those that do seem to have very few people actually using them. CS:GO is different. Pretty much every game mode except competitive is a toxic trashfire, but competitive itself is a lot of fun when everyone's communicating and working as a team, sometimes even when you're losing.
Lately I've experienced a lot less toxicity in my matches which is great, and I can't even remember the last time I was in a game with a blatant cheater - although smurfs and/or sus players do crop up pretty regularly.

Idk there's just a lot to like about this game, even in 2022. It's maps are so much better than it's "competitors", it's gunplay feels better, and the lack of a constantly changing meta due to new characters/abilities/weapons being introduced makes it easy to come back to after being away from the game for a while.
despite how old the game is, it's still pretty cool to play
